fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Green) each night.
- (Green): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- Your attacks will bypass protection abilities from any player incapable of dealing attacks of Powerful tier or greater.
- If two or more abilities are used by any member(s) of the Gatherers in a night, you will become 2002 Hookhand Mariner.
- Cannot spawn naturally.
